title: Pass-through non-regression testing
content:
Owned by MagOXT Last updated: Dec 05, 2017 by MagOXT

Audio controller passthrough

Test cases

Audio controller is shared by guest

Audio controller PT to first guest

Same audio controller PT to second guest

Audio controller unpassed from guests

Audio controller available in Dom0


 

GPU passthrough

Test cases

Prepare environment

Install new GPU in platform

Passthrough GPU to first guest

Test video and audio

Power abilities with a GPU PT

Passthrough GPU to second guest

Unpass GPU from the first guest


 

NIC passthrough

Test cases

Take NIC cards out of NDVM

Ethernet card PT to guest

Same Ethernet card PT to second guest

Ethernet card unpassed from guest

Wireless card PT to guest

Same Wireless card PT to second guest

Wireless card unpassed from guest


 

USB controller passthrough

Test cases

Identify USB PCI

USB controller PT to first guest

Same USB controller PT to second guest

USB controller unpassed from guests

USB controller available in Dom0
